verses.verse: So <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to Paddan-aram, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> your mother's father; and from <S%H1>there<s%> <S%H8033>take<s%> to yourself a <S%H3947>wife<s%> from the <S%H802>daughters<s%> of <S%H1323>Laban<s%> your mother's <S%H3837>brother.<s%>

"And may <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you and <S%H6509>make<s%> you <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you, that you may <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

"May He also <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> with you; that you may <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4033>sojournings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>"

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> and he <S%H1980>went<s%> to Paddan-aram to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Aramean,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

Now <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> him <S%H7971>away<s%> to Paddan-aram, to <S%H3947>take<s%> to himself a <S%H802>wife<s%> from <S%H8033>there,<s%> [and that] when he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him he <S%H6680>charged<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>"
and that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his father and his <S%H1>mother<s%> and had <S%H517>gone<s%> to Paddan-aram.
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H7451>displeased<s%> his father <S%H1>Isaac;<s%>

and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H3947>married,<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H5921>besides<s%> the <S%H802>wives<s%> that he had, <S%H4258>Mahalath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> Abraham's <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth.<s%>
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> toward <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

And he <S%H6293>came<s%> to a certain <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H3885>spent<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> had <S%H935>set;<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> one of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under his <S%H4763>head,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in that <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And he <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2492>dream,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H5551>ladder<s%> was <S%H5324>set<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> with its <S%H7218>top<s%> <S%H5060>reaching<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> were <S%H5927>ascending<s%> and <S%H3381>descending<s%> on it.

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> it and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your father <S%H1>Abraham<s%> and the <S%H85>God<s%> of <S%H430>Isaac;<s%> the <S%H3327>land<s%> on <S%H776>which<s%> you <S%H834>lie,<s%> I will <S%H7901>give<s%> it to you and to your <S%H5414>descendants.<s%>

"Your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> shall also be like the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and you shall <S%H6555>spread<s%> out to the <S%H3220>west<s%> and to the <S%H9506>east<s%> and to the <S%H6828>north<s%> and to the <S%H5045>south;<s%> and in you and in your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am with you, and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> you <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H1980>go,<s%> and will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H127>land;<s%> for I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> you <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H1696>promised<s%> you."

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>"Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> it."

And he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H3372>awesome<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place!<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H369>other<s%> <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>"

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> that he had <S%H7760>put<s%> under his <S%H4763>head<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it up as a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on its <S%H7218>top.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> <S%H199>however,<s%> <S%H7223>previously<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> had been <S%H3870>Luz.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5087>made<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will be with me and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> me on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> that I <S%H1980>take,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H899>garments<s%> to <S%H3847>wear,<s%>
and I <S%H7725>return<s%> to my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>safety,<s%> then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be my <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> up as a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> will be God's <S%H1004>house;<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that Thou dost <S%H5414>give<s%> me I will <S%H6237>surely<s%> <S%H6237>give<s%> a <S%H6237>tenth<s%> to Thee."
